file.name: anl_00_utc
file.description: This bash bsub script used to create ncum post production of analysis (i.e. forecast at 00Z as per EPS) at 00Z (grib2 files).

file.name: fcst_00_utc
file.description: This bash bsub script used to create ncum post production of forecast at 00Z (grib2 files).
